sen.j: 清内 雄行（きようち の おゆき、大同 (日本)3年（808年） - 元慶6年6月10日 (旧暦)（882年6月29日））は、平安時代前期の官人。
sen.e: KIYOUCHI no Oyuki (808-June 29, 882) was a government official (esp. one of low to medium rank) in the early Heian period.
KIYOUCHI no Oyuki (808-June 29, 882) was a government official (esp. one of low to medium rank) in the early Heian period.
KIYOUCHI no Oyuki (808-June 29, 882) was a government official who lived during the early Heian period.
He came from Shiki County, Kawachi Province.
He was from Shiki County, Kawachi Province.
sen.cmt: wasの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: He was from Shiki County, Kawachi Province.

sen.j: 本姓は河内氏忌寸であったが、清内氏宿祢の姓を賜る。
sen.e: His real surname was 'KAWACHI no Ikimi,' but he was conferred the surname 'KIYOUCHI no Sukune' later.
His original surname was 'KAWACHI no Ikimi,' but he was later conferred the surname 'KIYOUCHI no Sukune'.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため修正しました。
sen.e: His original surname was 'KAWACHI no Ikimi,' but he was later conferred the surname 'KIYOUCHI no Sukune'.

sen.j: 渡来人官人で、文徳天皇に孝経を侍講した記録が有り、儒者であったと思われる。
sen.e: He was a government official of Korean origin and is considered to have been a Confucian because it is recorded that he presented to Emperor Montoku lectures on Kokyo (The book of Filial Piety).
He was a government official from overseas and was believed to have been a Confucian based on recorded that he gave to Emperor Montoku lectures on Kokyo (The book of Filial Piety).
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため修正しました。渡来人だけでは韓国からなのかは不明のため、overseasに変更しました。
sen.e: He was a government official from overseas and was believed to have been a Confucian based on recorded that he gave to Emperor Montoku lectures on Kokyo (The book of Filial Piety).

sen.j: 元慶6年（882年）6月10日に従五位下丹波国介在職中に没する。
sen.e: On June 29, 882, he passed away while holding the post of Tanbano kuni no Suke (Assistant Governor of Tanba Province) of Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
On June 29, 882, he passed away while still active as the Jugoinoge Tanbano kuni no Suke (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, Assistant Governor of Tanba Province).
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため修正しました。
sen.e: On June 29, 882, he passed away while still active as the Jugoinoge Tanbano kuni no Suke (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, Assistant Governor of Tanba Province).
